synopsis.text: Itou Mizuki and Hentai Shinshi Club join forces to create a captivating short anime film, featuring the enchanting melody of "Semi." This collaboration is part of the 'TOHO Animation Music Films' project, a grand celebration of TOHO Animation Studio's 10th anniversary. As one of five unique films, this short anime promises a delightful fusion of music and animation, showcasing the creative prowess of the talented artists involved.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
